channel.title: Comments on: The World Premiere of Kuri Self-Charging
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Frank Engelman
item.dc:creator: Frank Engelman
item.description:
Kuri Does: Know where the kitchen is. Video
I can see how Kuri discovers the home floor plan, but how are the rooms identified to Kuri, e.g. where is the kitchen?
item.content:encoded:
Kuri Does: Know where the kitchen is. Video

I can see how Kuri discovers the home floor plan, but how are the rooms identified to Kuri, e.g. where is the kitchen?

item.title: By: Chris Matthews
item.dc:creator: Chris Matthews
item.description: Kuri loves dogs! And in our in-home tests, dogs tend to be curious about Kuri at first, and quickly get used to him being around. Kuri also would never steal the dog's food, which always helps in building a lasting friendship.
item.content:encoded: Kuri loves dogs! And in our in-home tests, dogs tend to be curious about Kuri at first, and quickly get used to him being around. Kuri also would never steal the dog’s food, which always helps in building a lasting friendship.

item.title: By: Chau Q
item.dc:creator: Chau Q
item.description: OMG I can't wait for the robot to arrive. I have 2 dogs at home, will the robot be able to get along with them?
item.content:encoded: OMG I can’t wait for the robot to arrive. I have 2 dogs at home, will the robot be able to get along with them?
